serviceTitle: At Questmind, we put our expertise at the service of our athletes by helping them build a solid career, develop an authentic brand image and create exceptional partnerships. With over six years' experience, we have developed a comprehensive, tailor-made approach designed to propel each player to the pinnacle of his or her career.

cards.title: Career Management
cards.content: We believe that every athlete deserves tailored support, comprehensive career management and a strategic vision for the future. Our mission is to offer them the best opportunities to ensure their long-term success. At Questmind, we offer a personalised service aimed at defining a career plan that embodies each individual's unique ambitions and potential.
cards.subContent: We also take care of finding the right team for our players, taking into account their goals, willingness and compatibility. We negotiate with teams to ensure beneficial agreements tailored to each athlete's aspirations.

cards.title: Sponsorships
cards.content: Sponsorship offers athletes a valuable opportunity to expand their network, raise their profile and generate additional income. By collaborating with brands and companies, athletes can not only benefit from financial support, but also reinforce their image as influencers in their field. This gives them access to exclusive resources, the opportunity to take part in high-profile events and diversify their sources of income while remaining focused on their performance. A well-chosen partnership can have a significant impact on a player's long-term career.

cards.title: Marketing
cards.content: In esports, visibility is an essential lever for success! We work closely with each player to build a brand image that is powerful, authentic and aligned with their personality. Our aim is to create an identity that resonates with the public, inspires trust with partners, and strengthens the commitment of fans. With a targeted communications strategy, we help each athlete stand out in a fast-growing sector and maximise their impact on the national and international stage!

cards.title: Administrative & legal support
cards.content: Esport is a field that requires mastery of the administrative and legal aspects, which are often complex and constantly evolving. Our team provides rigorous support for each player, taking charge of the in-depth examination, validation and authenticity of all contracts, thus guaranteeing solid and transparent agreements. We also offer sound financial advice and manage disputes and negotiations to protect the best interests of our athletes. This approach allows each player to concentrate fully on their performance, in complete confidence, while we ensure that every aspect of their career is built on a sound, stable and secure foundation.

brandsTitle: At Questmind, we create strategic partnerships between brands and our esport athletes to maximise impact and engagement. Esports offer a unique opportunity to unite a young and loyal audience. We use our expertise to help you develop tailor-made activations and effective sponsorship campaigns. Our Partnership Solutions :

brandsCards.title: Player Sponsorship
brandsCards.content: Associate your brand with top-level players, using levers that boost your visibility and the authenticity of your partnership.

brandsCards.title: Collaborations and Sponsored Content
brandsCards.content: Create captivating campaigns via videos, streams or publications, integrating your products into the world of top-level professional gamers.

brandsCards.title: Brand engagement during events
brandsCards.content: Benefit from optimum visibility at esport events, with your brand promoted by our athletes and the ability to offer immersive experiences to participants.

brandsCards.title: Co-Branding and Limited Editions
brandsCards.content: Launch co-branded or exclusive products with our talent to create a visual and memorable impact.

question: Why choose Questmind?

brandsResponses.content: Over 6 years expertise in the esport industry
Targeted and engaged audience, ideal for authentic campaigns
Maximum visibility thanks to our network of athletes at competitions and events.
Tailor-made partnerships to meet your specific needs
Constant innovation to stay ahead of the trends

brandsFooterText: Esports is a powerful strategic lever for your brand. Questmind is your partner to create strong and lasting partnerships in this world. Contact us today to explore your collaboration opportunities.
aboutText: Questmind was founded from a shared passion for esports, strengthened over time by years of experience and a robust network within the industry. We understand the demands of competitive gaming and the unique challenges players face. Our team comprises experts who live and breathe esports, dedicated to helping each player build a successful and sustainable career.

aboutCards.title: Passion
aboutCards.content: More than a job, esports is our calling

aboutCards.title: Excellence
aboutCards.content: We strive for quality at every stage of our players’ journeys

aboutCards.title: Commitment
aboutCards.content: Our talents deserve complete, uncompromising support

aboutCards.title: Integrity
aboutCards.content: Every decision is driven by transparency and respect

aboutResponse: At Questmind, we are more than an agency — we are a trusted partner invested in our players’ success. Our expertise allows us to anticipate market needs and position our talents for the best opportunities. With Questmind, turn your passion into success and join an agency that shares your ambitions.
contactText: Email us or complete the form to join our talents in their journey. You can use it to reach out for other inquires as well.
getInTouch:
Do you want to work with our talent ?
Get in touch now

conditions.title: 1/ PREAMBLE
conditions.textOne: These General Terms and Conditions of Sale (hereinafter referred to as "T&Cs") govern the contractual relationships between:
conditions.liOne: - Questmind, a sole proprietorship registered under the SIRET number FR92488225100011, with its registered office located at La Ville Besnard, 35400 Saint-Malo, France, represented by Killian SIMON.
conditions.liTwo: - The client: any natural or legal person using Questmind's services (hereinafter "the Client").
conditions.textTwo: By using Questmind's services, the Client unreservedly accepts these T&Cs.

conditions.title: 2/ PURPOSE OF THE T&Cs
conditions.textOne: These T&Cs define the rights and obligations of the parties within the framework of Questmind's services, consisting of:
conditions.liTwo: - The search for partnerships and sponsors.
conditions.liThree: - The management of communication for esports athletes.
conditions.textTwo: Questmind receives compensation in the form of commissions, directly invoiced either to the Client (athlete) or to the partner team or organization as contractually defined.

conditions.title: 3/ PAYMENT TERMS
conditions.textOne: Questmind accepts the following payment methods:
conditions.liOne: - Credit card: Payments by credit card must be made through a secure platform.
conditions.liTwo: - Bank transfer: Bank details will be specified on each issued invoice.
conditions.liThree: - Invoices issued by Questmind must be paid within 30 days from the date of receipt, unless otherwise stated on the invoice.
conditions.textTwo: If a late payment occures to the commission owed to:
conditions.liFour: - Late payment penalties will be applied starting from the day after the due date stated on the invoice. These penalties are calculated at an annual rate of 12%, equivalent to 1% per month of delay.
conditions.liFive: - A fixed recovery fee of €40 will also be added to each unpaid invoice, in accordance with Article D441-5 of the French Commercial Code.
conditions.liSix: - Questmind reserves the right to suspend its ongoing services or collaborations until the outstanding amounts are settled.
conditions.textThree: Questmind's services will begin only after the signing of a contract or written agreement and, if applicable, after the payment of any initial agreed amount.

conditions.title: 4/ COMPENSATION TERMS
conditions.liOne: - Questmind receives a commission corresponding to a percentage of the revenue generated by the Client within the framework of partnerships, sponsorships, or any other income directly related to the esports activity managed by Questmind.
conditions.liTwo: - The commission percentage and billing terms are defined in a written agreement or contract signed between Questmind and the Client (or the team).
conditions.textOne: The commission may be invoiced directly:
conditions.liThree: - To the Client (athlete): based on the income received through partnerships or sponsorships.
conditions.liFour: - To the partner team or organization: based on the income generated through the collaboration between the athlete and the team, or as stipulated in contractual agreements.
conditions.textTwo: A detailed invoice will be issued by Questmind specifying the basis for calculating the commission (amount of the partnership or sponsorship).

conditions.title: 5/ OBLIGATIONS OF Questmind
conditions.liOne: - Questmind commits to making all reasonable efforts to seek opportunities, partners, and sponsors for the esports athletes it manages.
conditions.liTwo: - Questmind does not guarantee specific results, as these depend on many external factors.
conditions.liThree: - Questmind commits to maintaining the confidentiality of the information provided by the Client.

conditions.title: 6/ OBLIGATIONS OF THE CLIENT
conditions.liOne: - The Client commits to actively collaborating with Questmind by providing all necessary information for the completion of the services.
conditions.liTwo: - The Client commits to informing Questmind of any income received through partnerships or sponsors negotiated thanks to its services.
conditions.liThree: - If commissions are to be invoiced directly to teams or partner organizations, the Client must facilitate communication between Questmind and the concerned parties.

conditions.title: 7/ APPLICABLE LAW AND DISPUTES
conditions.liOne: - These T&Cs are governed by French law.
conditions.liTwo: - In the event of a dispute, the parties commit to seeking an amicable solution.
conditions.liThree: - If no agreement is reached, the dispute will be submitted to the competent courts of the location of Questmind's registered office.

conditions.title: 8/ MISCELLANEOUS PROVISIONS
conditions.textOne: For any questions or requests regarding the T&Cs, you can contact Questmind:
conditions.textTwo: The T&Cs as established may be modified at any time and unilaterally. However, acceptance of these T&Cs will be required again from the Client.

terms.title: 1/ WEBSITE PRESENTATION
terms.textOne: In accordance with Article 6 of Law No. 2004-575 of June 21, 2004, for confidence in the digital economy, the following is provided to the users of the website https://www.Questmind.gg, regarding the identity of the various stakeholders involved in its creation and monitoring:
terms.textTwo: Owner: Questmind - Killian SIMON. SIRET Number: FR92488225100011 – La Ville Besnard, 35400 Saint-Malo, France
terms.textThree:
Publication Manager: Questmind - Killian SIMON – contact@Questmind.gg
The publication manager is either an individual or a legal entity.
terms.textFive: Host: PlanetHoster – 4416 Louis B. Mayer – Laval Québec CANADA – H7P 0G1
terms.textSix: Data Protection Officer: Killian SIMON – ksimon@Questmind.gg

terms.title: 2/ INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY
terms.textOne: All content on the Website, including but not limited to texts, images, graphics, logos, videos, and icons, is the exclusive property of Questmind or its partners, unless explicitly stated otherwise.
terms.textTwo: Any reproduction, representation, modification, publication, or adaptation of all or part of the elements of the Website, by any means or process, is prohibited without prior written permission from Questmind.

terms.title: 3/ PERSONAL DATA
terms.textOne: As part of the use of the contact form on the Website, Questmind collects personal data necessary to respond to your requests.
terms.textTwo: The data collected via the contact form is used solely to respond to your requests and to provide any follow-up on your communications.
terms.textThree: The data is retained for a period of 3 (three) years from the last exchange.
terms.textFour: In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and the French Data Protection Act, you have the following rights:
terms.liFour: - Right of access, rectification, and deletion of your data.
terms.liSix: Right to object to and restrict the processing of your data.
terms.textFive: To exercise these rights, you can contact: <u>contact@Questmind.gg</u>.

terms.title: 4/ COOKIES
terms.textOne: The Website may use cookies to improve the browsing experience and collect anonymous data on the use of the Website. You can configure your browser to refuse cookies or to be notified before accepting their installation.

terms.title: 5/ LIABILITY
terms.textOne: Questmind strives to provide the most accurate information possible on the Website. However, Questmind cannot be held responsible for any omissions, inaccuracies, or deficiencies in the update, whether caused by Questmind or third-party partners providing the information.

terms.title: 6/ CONTACT
terms.textOne: For any questions or requests regarding the legal notice, you can contact Questmind at the following address: contact@Questmind.gg.

chartHeader: Questmind's Code of Ethics and Professional Conduct
chartPreambleText: Questmind is committed to promoting an ethical, responsible professional activity that respects the fundamental values of transparency, integrity, and inclusion. This charter establishes the principles and rules of conduct that all employees, partners, and stakeholders must adhere to.

chart.title: 1/ COMPLIANCE WITH LAWS AND REGULATIONS
chart.textOne: All members of Questmind are committed to respecting the applicable laws and regulations, both at the national and international levels, in their area of activity.

chart.title: 2/ INTEGRITY AND TRANSPARENCY
chart.textOne: - We are committed to acting with honesty and loyalty in all our professional interactions.
chart.textTwo: - We guarantee full transparency regarding our activities, partnerships, and commitments.
chart.textThree: - We reject any form of corruption, fraud, or conflict of interest.

chart.title: 3/ RESPECT AND INCLUSION
chart.textOne: - We promote an inclusive work environment that respects diversity.
chart.textTwo: - We are committed to combating any form of discrimination, harassment, or violence.
chart.textThree: - We ensure that everyone can thrive in a supportive and fair environment.

chart.title: 4/ SOCIAL AND ENVIRONMENTAL RESPONSIBILITY
chart.textOne: - We are committed to minimizing our environmental impact by adopting eco-friendly practices.
chart.textTwo: - We encourage initiatives that promote sustainable development and social responsibility.

chart.title: 5/ DATA PROTECTION AND PRIVACY
chart.textOne: - We guarantee the protection of personal and professional data in accordance with applicable regulations.
chart.textTwo: - We ensure the confidentiality of information exchanged within the scope of our activities.

chart.title: 6/ PROFESSIONAL COMMITMENT
chart.textOne: - We encourage excellence and rigor in our missions and services.
chart.textTwo: - We promote the sharing of knowledge and the development of our employees' skills.
chart.textThree: - We value innovation and creativity in all of our projects.

chart.title: 7/ ETHICS AND BEST PRACTICES IN COLLABORATIONS
chart.textOne: - We are committed to maintaining professional relationships based on mutual respect and trust.
chart.textTwo: - We favor partnerships that align with our ethical and responsible values.
chart.textThree: - We ensure that each collaboration is carried out in a legal and transparent manner.

chart.title: 8/ SANCTIONS AND ENFORCEMENT
chart.textOne:
Any violation of the principles of this charter may result in disciplinary measures, including the termination of the collaboration.
Questmind reserves the right to evaluate and adapt this charter to ensure its effectiveness and relevance.

chart.title: CONCLUSION
chart.textOne:
By adhering to this charter, each member of Questmind commits to respecting and promoting these values on a daily basis.
This charter reflects our desire to build an ethical, responsible, and sustainable professional environment.
